name: HealthBehaviorAssessmentAndIndividualInterventionCPT
title:
Health Behavior Assessment and Individual Intervention
 (CPT)
description: This code set includes CPT billing codes for health and behavior individual encounters including those for evaluation, re-evaluation, and interventions.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT billing codes for assessment (including reassessment) and individual intervention procedures for psychological, behavior, emotional, cognitive, and social factors important to the prevention, treatment, or management of physical health problems.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are assessed or treated for non-medical factors contributing to health problems in individual encounters. This element maps to the "Intervention" category in the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes assessment, reassessment, and individual health and behavior interventions.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes encounters for group and family health and behavior interventions.)

concept.display: Health behavior assessment, or re-assessment (ie, health-focused clinical interview, behavioral observations, clinical decision making)
Health behavior intervention, individual, face-to-face; initial 30 minutes

contains.display: Health behavior assessment, or re-assessment (ie, health-focused clinical interview, behavioral observations, clinical decision making)
Health behavior intervention, individual, face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
